meanings.definition: Affected with nausea; inclined to vomit.
meanings.sent1: The bumpy car ride made me feel nauseous.
meanings.sent2: The smell of rotten eggs was so nauseous that I had to leave the room.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating a peanut butter and pickle sandwich sounded nauseous to me.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the overflowing garbage can was so nauseous, it made me want to run away.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the spoiled milk was so nauseous that I couldn't take another sip.

meanings.sent1: The nauseous smell of the garbage made everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie had a nauseous effect on the audience.
meanings.sent3: The prankster's fake vomit was so nauseous, it fooled everyone in the office.
meanings.sent4: The politician's lies were so nauseous that even his supporters started to doubt him.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the expired yogurt was so nauseous that it made me gag.
